original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 16.4. Kusalattika, Hetusahetukaduka
analyzed: kusala ttika hetu sa hetuka duka

original: Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
analyzed: kusalam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko ca

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ

original: nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam hetuñca iva sa hetukañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato nahetu ceva naahetuko
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko ca na abyākataḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
analyzed: abyākatam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko ca

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ

original: nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam hetuñca iva sa hetukañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu
analyzed: kusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva
analyzed: na abyākataḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam sa hetukam ca iva

original: na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko
analyzed: na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na ahetuko ca iva na na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na ahetuko

original: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu
analyzed: akusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva
analyzed: na abyākataḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam sa hetukam ca iva

original: na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko
analyzed: na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na ahetuko ca iva na na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na ahetuko

original: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

analyzed: abyākatam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu

analyzed: ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ sahetukañceva
analyzed: na akusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam sa hetukam ca iva

original: na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naakusalo naahetuko
analyzed: na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca na akusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ

original: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
